Key Match Events: The Knicks led for the first time at 14-12 with 6:08 left in the first quarter
The Raptors scored eight in a row to pull within 50-48 on a floater by RJ Barrett with 1:15 left in the first half
The Knicks began pulling away by ending the third quarter on a 25-18 run
The Knicks scored 15 unanswered points in the fourth, while Toronto went 0-for-8 with two turnovers during a stretch lasting more than five minutes
Miscellaneous Highlights: Immanuel Quickley and RJ Barrett were sent to Toronto in exchange for OG Anunoby on Dec. 30, 2023. New York has won all five matchups since the deal
Others: Chris Boucher added 10 points, all in the final four minutes of the fourth
